title: Industrial Attachment
description: This internship module is for students who want to extend their internship period by another 4 weeks after completing EG3611a.
prerequisite:
Students should be of or are expected to be at least Year 3 in standing.
Student should complete CFG career coaching modules (to be finalized) prior to start of internship.
preclusion:
EG3601 Industrial Attachment Programme 
EG3611 Industrial Attachment
EG3602 Vacation Internship Programme
EG3612 Vacation Internship Programme
corequisite: EG2401 should be read either before or during the  semester on internship.
